title: I Can't Post on the Boards and I'm level 9
body: My account is level 9 but it still says I must be level 7 to post. Can someone help update it? <3

replies.body: Posting here will generally do the trick, but as Kokua mentioned, that Syncing Tool will get the job done as well if it ever happens again ^_^

Posting here updated your level. Alternatively, you could use the [Syncing Tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool), but this works too. Your level is displaying as level 9 now.
